description: Relationship between a user and an acquistions Unit

userId.description: The UUID of the user to associate with the acquisitions unit

acquisitionsUnitId.description: The acquisition unit the user is a member of

metadata.title: Metadata Schema
metadata.description: Metadata about creation and changes to records, provided by the server (client should not provide)

createdDate.description: Date and time when the record was created

createdByUserId.description: ID of the user who created the record (when available)

createdByUsername.description: Username of the user who created the record (when available)

updatedDate.description: Date and time when the record was last updated

updatedByUserId.description: ID of the user who last updated the record (when available)

updatedByUsername.description: Username of the user who last updated the record (when available)
